name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a high chance to grant you a dose of Venomous Potential. At 5 doses, inject them into your target to deal 305,552 Nature damage over 3 sec.

Dealing Nature damage has a chance to grant you an additional dose.
Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 12,865 Strength for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Carefully balance the Egg's incubation. While stationary, gain 167 Strength every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while moving. While moving, gain 154 of your highest secondary stat every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while stationary. 

Additional stacks above 20 grant 60% reduced benefit.
Use: Suspend the Egg's incubation state for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,602 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
